title: mogulus.com/
content:
Hi friend

I need your help, Im looking for the font used for this logo [http://www.mogulus.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120339/http:/www.mogulus.com/)

Thanks in advance

Miguel
author: hernando

comments.content:
Whatever it is, it looks free. Try [http://www.dafont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120339/http:/www.dafont.com/ "http://www.dafont.com")

- Lex

what is the name of the font? can you tell me please because Whatever not match

help please

Miguel

is there a way to find that font ?

thanks

Miguel
I'd also suggest going to Dafont.com and looking under the techno style.

Sorry - I didn't mean that it was named "Whatever" - I meant that I didn't know what it was and that you should look at that site to see if you could find it there.

- Lex

Thank you, but not I could not find it .......something closer to the font ?

Thanks

Miguel
